Configure a screen layout as an add-in

1 Click the Add-Ins button .

Or, on the Template menu, click Add-Ins.

2 Click New.

3 In Add-In Type, click Screen Layout.

4 Select a screen layout to add from the screen layout list box.

5 In Menu Command, enter a command name to appear on the Screen Layout menu.

6 In Shortcut Key, enter a character to be used as a shortcut to activate the command (optional).

7 Click OK.

8 When you are finished configuring add-ins, click Close.

Note: To create a new screen layout, first start Anesthesia Manager, PACU Manager or Critical Care Manager with a fictitious patient and arrange the screen as wanted. Then click Save Screen As on the Screen Layouts menu and give the layout a name. The layout will then be available when configuring add-ins with Customize.
